org.orgName: District Court of the Territory of Washington

div1.p: Territory of Washington County of King ss. In the District Court of the 3rd Judicial District of Washington Territory, holding term at Seattle for said County of King. In characters,
In the matter of the application of a. a. De Meules for a writ of Habeas Corpus. Petition
For Hon. C. H. Hanford Judge of the District Court of the 3rd Judicial District of Washington Territory

Your petitioner a. a. De Meules respectfully shows that he is unlawfully imprisoned, detained, confined and restained of his liberty by behalf of McGraw Sheriff of King County W. T. and Stewart Silie, Jailor of King County W. T. at the County Jail in said King County, W. T. at Seattle.
That the said detention imprisonment confinement

and restrait are illegal; and that the illegality thereof consists of this to wit that the Justice of the Peace who tried the said cause and declared this said petitioner at Haughton King Co. Washington Territory. had no jureselection over either the person herein or of the offence committed, it any offence even committed, because said Justice was not enformed by any authority of law whithin to issue process agaisnt or try said defl. because he had not an authority of Justice of the Peace for Haughton. Preceint King County where law offence was alledged to have been committed tried sued that said warrant of committed shows the same and that said Justice of the Peace had no anchor by of law to either try caniret or pentence this from petitioner under the laws of Washington Ter. and that your petitioner is detained
